title: Kaiya Pudichaa Tharumaru Lyrics Kalakalappu 2
stanzas:
kaiyya pudichaa tharumaaru
katti anaichaa tharumaaru
konjam sirichaa tharumaaru
unnaala penne en manasu
suthum ooru.

ok ok
ini ellaam ok
locku locke
unkooda locke.

aanene azhagiye..
aanaalum azhagula
unnathaan minja
indha ulagathil
yaarumillaiye.

non-stopu kadhalu
full stopu aagaathu.
hai bye sonnaalum
heart breaku podaathu.

un height enna sollu
un weight enna sollu
una thookki konja
naan jim poga poren.
arnolda maara poren
unkooda gethaa thaan
vazha poren.

unkooda locke.

aanene azhagiye..

unnathaan minja
indha ulagathil
yaarumilla

yaarumillaiye.
